title: BRIEF-Aphria Inc Announces Second Consecutive Quarter Of Profitability And Positive Adjusted EBITDA
text:
BRIEF-Aphria Inc Announces Second Consecutive Quarter Of Profitability And Positive Adjusted EBITDA

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 15, 2019 07:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Aphria Inc Announces Second Consecutive Quarter Of Profitability And Positive Adjusted EBITDA Oct 15 (Reuters) - APHRIA INC : * APHRIA INC ANNOUNCES SECOND CONSECUTIVE QUARTER OF PROFITABILITY AND POSITIVE ADJUSTED EBITDA * APHRIA INC REITERATES FISCAL YEAR 2020 OUTLOOK * APHRIA INC - NET REVENUE OF $126.1 MILLION IN Q1 * APHRIA INC - REVENUE FOR ADULT-USE CANNABIS OF $20.0 MILLION IN Q1, AN INCREASE OF 8% FROM PRIOR QUARTER * APHRIA INC - Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE C$0.07 * FY2020 REVENUE VIEW C$644.9 MILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA * Q1 REVENUE VIEW C$132.2 MILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA

BRIEF-Aphria Inc Announces Second Consecutive Quarter Of Profitability And Positive Adjusted EBITDA
